name: Leechr
body:
### Why waste time downloading TV NZB files when it can be done for you?

Leechr will check your [myepisodes.com](http://www.myepisodes.com/) page for the shows you need to acquire and will automatically download the relevant NZB files from your favourite NZB sites.

Works great with a news-reader that can auto-import NZB files from a directory.

***

### Leechr features include:
* Automatic searching and retrieval of NZB files from:
  * [NZBNDX.com](http://www.nzbndx.com/)
  * [Newshost.co.za](http://www.newshost.co.za/)
  * [Sickbeard.com](http://www.sickbeard.com/)
  * [nzbx.co](http://www.nzbx.co/)
  * [nzb.cc](http://www.nzb.cc/)
  * [Usenet-Crawler.com](http://www.usenet-crawler.com/)
  * [nzbclub.com](http://www.nzbclub.com/)
  * [nzbs.org](http://www.nzbs.org/)
  * and your own [Newznab+](http://www.newznab.com/) site!
* Automatically mark episodes 'acquired' on [myepisodes.com](http://www.myepisodes.com/).
* Video-file verification, no more passworded downloads.
* Automatic Update of Leechr and helpers.dat
* Platform Independent, only requirement is Python 2.6+

***

You can catch up with any Leechr news/updates at [Ashysoft Homepage](http://ashysoft.wordpress.com/) or on [Twitter](http://twitter.com/ashysoft) or on [Google+](https://plus.google.com/u/0/110362170448417653776)

If you find Leechr useful please consider [buying me a beer!](http://ashysoft.wordpress.com/donate/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
